title: Instant tomato chutney
ingredients: ['4 large ripe tomatoes, chopped', '1 dessertspoon dry mustard powder', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 cloves garlic, peeled (optional)', '1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds', '2 dried red chilli peppers', '1 dessertspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon chilli powder (optional)']
